ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and guided them on the Straight Path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And showed them the straight path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and showed them the Straight Way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: guided them to the right path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And guided them to the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And guided them to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We guided them both on the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and guided them in the straight path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And showed them the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and guided them to the straight path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We led the twain on Unto the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and guided them to the straight path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We guided them to the Straight Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And guided them to the Right Path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and guided them upon the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We guided them upon the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We guided them on the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:118]   And We guided them to the straight path, [the straight] way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And showed them the right path) We confirmed them on the true, straight religion.
